method.text: Melt the oil and butter together in a large frying pan. Add the pork fillets and saute for 4-5 min turning frequently until browned all over. Remove from the pan and place in a deep ovenproof casserole dish.
Add the shallots and garlic to the pan and saute for 5 min. Add to the pork in the casserole dish.
Quickly fry the cabbage in the same frying pan for 6 min, seasoning well. Add the cider to the cabbage and cook for a further 8 min.
Spoon the cabbage and juices over the pork fillets to completely cover them. Top with the sprigs of thyme. Cover with foil. Cook in the oven for 35 min.
Remove the foil and discard the thyme. Using a slotted spoon transfer the red cabbage to a large warmed serving dish. Slice the pork and arrange on top of the cabbage.
Serve garnished with the shallots and a sprinkling of parsley.

title: Braised pork fillet with red cabbage
